original_title: Results of 2022 G.C.E. O/L exam released
original_body_lines: The results of the 2022(2023) G.C.E. Ordinary Level Examination have been released last night (Nov.30).
Department of Examinations said the results can be viewed on its official websites: www.doenets.lk / www.results.exams.gov.lk
Meanwhile, applications for re-scrutinization of the results will be accepted from December 14 – 18.
The exam was held from May 29 to June 08 this year at 3,568 centres island-wide and with 472,553 candidates in total sitting for the exam.
